body_html:
You can hack Estimator to do that by putting all the input logic into model_fn and having a dummy input_fn.
Current separation of input from model gives us flexibility. We're not considering a duplex interaction.

body:
You can hack Estimator to do that by putting all the input logic into model_fn and having a dummy input_fn.
Current separation of input from model gives us flexibility. We're not considering a duplex interaction.
